page.title: 20Alston Primary School,A.Moor
page.content: Alston Primary School is a state primary school with{115 children}aged from 4 to 11 years, there are{4 full- {time and 1 part-time teachers including the head and deputy-head teachers. There is a welfare assistant, a caretaker and a part-time secretary. The children are divided into 4 classes by age. One third of the children are transported to school by bus and taxi(the furthest living 7 miles from school), the rest living in Alston within three miles of the school. The school is a single storey building made of stone with a slate roof, errected in 1900 as a grammar school becoming a primary school when new premesis were built for the grammar school in 1960. There are 6 classrooms and a hall while outside there is a playground, a sports field and a 3ft deep swimming pool.
